attributes.action: Change proposed UK Passport application laws and procedures planned for 2008/ 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We do not accept the policy changes in 2008 and 2009 regarding new and renewal of UK Passports. We believe it is an infringements of our Human Rights and the basis of the Magna Carta.
We believe a government holding private information on its citizens is highly dangerous and could be used against them by the state as history has witnessed.

rejection.details: This peition overlaps with several already in existence - http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/CardsID/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
